mapper.insert: insert into user_acct_tmp_sys_res_role_r2_res (tmp_sys_res_role_sid, sys_res_sid, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values (#{sysResRoleSid}, #{sysResSid}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{versionNum})

insert into user_acct_tmp_sys_res_role_r2_res (tmp_sys_res_role_sid, sys_res_sid, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values
(#{item.sysResRoleSid}, #{item.sysResSid}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.versionNum})
mapper.update:
update user_acct_tmp_sys_res_role_r2_res
version_num = version_num + 1,
tmp_sys_res_role_sid = #{sysResRoleSid},
sys_res_sid = #{sysResSid},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where sid = #{sid} and version_num = #{versionNum}
